episodes.title: Is the Lord's Recovery right about the ground of the church? | The Lord's Recovery | Witness Lee
episodes.description:

The co-workers in the Lord's Recovery have admitted that Witness Lee's teachings are not infallible. So, we are testing his teachings against the Bible. Like the Bible tells us to do.

episodes.title: Yes, Witness Lee's teaching DOES justify covering up gross sins | The Lord's Recovery | Witness Lee
episodes.description:
PLEASE READ:  In this video, the gross sins of King David are discussed, and the terms used are "affair" and "adultery".  These are not the terms that we should have used.  The term used should have been "rape".  Anyone who understands abuse should immediately recognize the power imbalance Bathsheba would have experienced being summoned and desired by the King - someone in extreme authority you fear saying "no" to.  David raped Bathsheba.  The prophet Nathan put all of the blame on David, and we never see Bathsheba labeled guilty.

Let me be clear:  Witness Lee's teaching explicitly threatens you with curses, death, and ruin if you speak up about gross sins of those in the lead, if you speak up about things like rape and murder.  This is not a man of God, this is not "God's deputy authority", this is not "the ministry of the age", and this is NOT the apostles' teaching.  It's evil and abusive, and should be exposed.

------------------------------

Testing Witness Lee’s teaching about speaking up about the sins of deputy authority, abuse, gross sins, etc.

The co-workers in the Lord's Recovery have admitted that Witness Lee's teachings are not infallible. So, we are testing his teachings against the Bible. Like the Bible tells us to do.
